channel.title: go on CoTutorial
channel.description: Recent content in go on CoTutorial

item.title: Creating Go Based Lambda Functions in AWS - Tutorial
item.description: If you haven’t heard already AWS recently announced support for creating AWS Lambda functions using the Go programming language. As a huge fan of the language and of AWS itself I thought this would be the perfect opportunity to combine both and create a simple tutorial on how to create your own Lambda functions in Go. Video Tutorial Conclusion If you found this tutorial useful or require further assistance then please feel free to let me know in the comments section below!
